title: Police investigating accidental shooting
content:
CORPUS CHRISTI (KIII NEWS) - Corpus Christi police were called out to the La Sista Motel in the 4300 Block of Leopard Friday night to investigate a shooting.
Police tell us a child somehow got hold of a gun and fired off a shot hitting a 73-year-old man in the upper chest. The man was rushed to the hospital and is expected to survive. Right now police are not releasing details on the child. They are investigating this as an accidental shooting.
Police did arrest the child's mother on an outstanding warrant.
